knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Information on Quantity of Controlled Drugs Siezed

```{r,echo=TRUE,eval=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
quantity_drugs_seized <- read_csv("Informationonquantityofcontrolleddrugsseized.csv")
quantity_drugs_seized
unique(quantity_drugs_seized$drug)
```

## Inhalant Abusers Arrested by Status

```{r,echo=TRUE,eval=TRUE}
abusers_by_status <- read_csv("DataonInhalantAbusersArrestedByStatus.csv")
abusers_by_status
unique(abusers_by_status$year)
```

## Inhalant Abusers Arrested by Age

```{r,echo=TRUE,eval=TRUE}
abusers_by_age <- read_csv("DataonInhalantAbusersArrestedbyAgeGroup.csv")
abusers_by_age
unique(abusers_by_age$year)
unique(abusers_by_age$age_group)
```
